name: Silly Blue
description:
Silly Blue is a snowman building game!

Roll the snowballs through the snow to increase their size. When you’re satisfied with the size roll them into the red zone to stack them. Additionally gather deco elements (like carrots or coal) and also bring them to the turquoise zone to finalize your snowman.

Thank you for playing.

Controls: 

WASD  —  Move Around
